title: St. Louis man fatally shot himself in head while unloading gun, police say
content:
ST. LOUIS • A man who was unloading his firearm when it discharged Tuesday morning was fatally shot in the head, police say.
The victim was identified as Willie Crowder, 31, of the 8500 block of Riverview Boulevard.
At about 6 a.m. Tuesday, police found Crowder dead in his home. He had been shot in the head.
The incident is being handled as a "suspicious death" pending the results of an autopsy.
